root: ^You have been given the job of transporting a large shipment of alien artifacts. Representing the knowledge and culture of a dead civilization, Kellis wants them delivered safe and sound.

^This job should go as smoothly as any other routine cargo transportation and delivery.  That being said,  Kellis has made it clear that one of the biggest and most valuable relics is to stay within its cargo container no matter what. It is not to be moved or opened under threat of having your pay docked.

^The orders can be explained by not only the value of the artifact, but the fact that several of the digging crew had several incidents involving violence. As the dig had progressed, arguments became more and more common, culminating in an attempt to damage some of the artifacts, with the culprit suffering fatal injuries when another archaeologist stopped him.
